__e: Innocent people are dying, and you might be our only chance to save them.
Haven't you realized you're endangering many others?
Why scuttle the whole conference? Why didn't you come to me for help?
Try anything, innocent people get hurt.
300 innocent people will die if you don't.
If you don't help me, someone might destroy her, and innocent people will die.
Even if that means killing innocent people it's that simple for you?
There are actual innocent people involved. The Boy has a mother.
And as hard is it is to believe... we, too, once were innocent children. You are such a shameless ham.
You know you've harmed so many babies?
Act like like totally innocent children.
What if there are innocent lives at risk?
These are innocent lives we're talking about.
Most people would if it saved innocent lives.
I mean, as an American, I know you're just doin' your job, and sometimes innocent folks like me get caught up in the system.
You butchered and clawed your way into my pockets, and innocent people died in the process.
Innocent people get hurt, and... and other people... people who are not good... get to walk around doing whatever they want.
But killing an innocent woman will not bring them back.
No, sir, I come only to save my innocent wife and my friends.
He'd already killed an innocent woman when I met him, and now, he's killed another.
Well, if we don't do anything, then more innocents will be hurt.
I know the whole story, so you can quit playing innocent.
I will not help you in the killing of innocent civilians.
